UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Stores user profile information, including preferred language for i18n support.

birthDate.description: User's birthdate, used for astrological insights.

MoodLog.title: MoodLog
MoodLog.description: Stores daily mood logs for users, including mood and diary entries.

mood.description: User's mood for the day (e.g., happy, neutral, sad).

diaryEntry.description: Optional diary entry (text or voice note).

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the mood was logged.

AssessmentResult.title: AssessmentResult
AssessmentResult.description: Stores results from mental health assessments (PHQ-9, GAD-7).

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the assessment was taken.

MedicationReminder.title: MedicationReminder
MedicationReminder.description: Stores medication reminders and associated details.

isTaken.description: Indicates if the medication was taken.

Routine.title: Routine
Routine.description: Stores information about the 7-day mind-peace plan.

focus.description: The focus of the day (e.g., breathing, movement).

completed.description: Indicates if the routine was completed for the day.

Caregiver.title: Caregiver
Caregiver.description: Stores information about caregivers or family members linked to a user.

contactInfo.description: Caregiver's contact information (e.g., phone number, email).

MultilingualContent.title: MultilingualContent
MultilingualContent.description: Stores content with translations for multiple languages.

translations.description: Object containing translations for different languages (e.g., {'en': 'Welcome', 'ta': 'வரவேற்பு'}).

/users/{userId}/mood_logs/{moodLogId}.description: Stores mood logs for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/assessment_results/{asse.description: Stores assessment results for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/medication_reminders/{me.description: Stores medication reminders for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/routines/{routineId}.description: Stores routine information for a specific user.

/doctors/{doctorId}.description: Stores information about verified doctors. Publicly readable.

/caregivers/{caregiverId}.description: Stores information about caregivers. Access controlled by relationships.

/multilingual_content/{contentId}.description: Stores multilingual content accessible to all users. Write access restricted to admins.
